body:
We have an introduction to HackerRank Screen learning paths and courses available through the HackerRank Academy!

Including coverage of:

  • Creating a test
  • Adding questions 
  • Utilizing the HackerRank library of questions
  • Creating a custom question
  • Cloning a question 
  • Question templates
  • Test Settings
  • Inviting candidates
  • Candidate's perspective
  • Accessing a report

How can the HackerRank Academy be accessed?

  1. Through the HackerRank Academy URL, you'll be asked to provide your name and work email address.
  2. Through the HackerRank Platform (instructions below)
    • Log in to the HackerRank for Work Platform.
    • Click on the Academy Link at the bottom of the screen. (As highlighted in the image below)
    • Enjoy the available courses and learning paths!
title: Getting Started with HackerRank Screen
